name: Get-er-Run
description:
Attention!! Please play this game at fullscreen

This is a game I created for my final year project in my diploma programmed.  My project is titled Get-er-Run(Covid-19). This game was created as a fun interactive approach to raise people's awareness and knowledge about Covid-19. 

The major concept of this game is Covid-19. This concept was chosen to satisfy the project's objective of creating a game that would educate people about how dangerous covid-19 is.

In this game, there will be 5 level. Player feel free to choose what level do you want to play. There will be obstacles such as Virus Covid-19, Saw And Arrow Trap. Please be careful. The scoreboard will be provided after finish the game.

This game will be played in the browser, so there will be no need to download anything. Feel free to give it a try, I definitely appreciate your time.
